infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: RUNSTR needs access to your workout data to automatically sync your fitness activities and calculate team rankings for Bitcoin rewards.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: RUNSTR needs to read your workout data to track your fitness progress and team contributions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RUNSTR needs location access to track your running, walking, and cycling activities accurately, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RUNSTR needs location access to track your running, walking, and cycling activities.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RUNSTR needs location access to continue tracking your workout when the app is in the background.

plugins.photosPermission: RUNSTR needs access to your photos to select a profile picture.
plugins.cameraPermission: RUNSTR needs camera access to take profile pictures and scan QR codes to join fitness challenges and events.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: RUNSTR needs location access to track your running, walking, and cycling activities accurately.

plugins.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: RUNSTR needs access to your workout data to automatically sync your fitness activities and calculate team rankings for Bitcoin rewards.
plugins.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: RUNSTR needs to read your workout data to track your fitness progress and team contributions.
